m_descr:
This app allows you to send notifications by SMS.
A virtual device is generated, that will send you a SMS to the deposited phone number with each command 'on'. It use AWS SNS to send the SMS.
With the checkbox you are able to hide the widget in elements view.
rl_hidden: Hide the created widget on elements view.
h_phone_number: The phone number, that should receive the notifications.
